entry.title: Combined summary - Nakapay
entry.summary: In this article, the author discusses the potential benefits of technological advancements such as URI's, Bluetooth, and P2P wireless transmissions in improving the user interface. Specifically, the author highlights their contribution towards making Bitcoin invoicing and payments easier through Nakapay. However, the author expresses a need for a wallet developer to integrate Nakapay into their system. This integration would allow for seamless transactions using Nakapay, ultimately enhancing the user experience. Overall, the discussion emphasizes the importance of incorporating new technologies into existing systems to optimize functionality and improve user satisfaction.
